dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.undertitle: Below you can see your favourite streams

settings.title: Settings
settings.reset_info: After clicking on Reset, all saved data will be irrevocably deleted! Are you sure?

general.title: General
general.athome_info: If enabled, incoming notifications and recordings will be disabled for NOT excluded cameras!
general.exclude_info: Excluded cameras are not affected from 'At Home'. These cameras will continue to send notifications and take recordings.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.timer_info: Timer in seconds to generate a new Snapshot from camera (if livestream disabled)
dashboard.favourite_info: If enabled, this camera will be displayed in the dashboard.
dashboard.livestream_info: If enabled, this camera will show a Livestream. If disabled, it will show Snapshots generated after specific timer (see Image refresh timer).

recordings.title: Recordings
recordings.active_info: If enabled, recording will be activated for all cameras. Recording will be triggered from motion.
recordings.type_info: Choose between Snapshot and Video. Snapshot will change recording to JPEG files and Video will change recording to MP4 files.
recordings.timer_info: Timer in seconds for video recording (if recording type is video).
recordings.remove_info: Timer in days for automatically remove recordede files from disk.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.remove_info: Timer in hours for automatically remove notifications from cache and interface.
notifications.remove_banner_info: Timer in seconds for slide up incoming notifiation banner.

telegram.title: Telegram
telegram.active_info: Enbales telegram notification for motion alerts.
telegram.token_info: The token given by @BotFather when creating the Telegram bot.
telegram.chatid_info: The chat ID given by the bot after sending '/start' to it.
telegram.motion_text_info: Customized text in telegram for motion alerts. (@ will be replaced with camera name).
telegram.type_info: You can choose between several options for telegram notification. Video and Snapshot will only work if recording is activated!

camviews.title: CamViews
camviews.timer_info: Timer in seconds to generate a new Snapshot from camera (if livestream disabled)
camviews.favourite_info: If enabled, this camera will be displayed in the dashboard.
camviews.livestream_info: If enabled, this camera will show a Livestream. If disabled, it will show Snapshots generated after specific timer (see Image refresh timer).

webhook.title: Webhook
webhook.active_info: If enabled, the motion handler will additionally trigger given webhook endpoint on motion detection.
webhook.on_info: Trigger Webhook Endpoint on motion detection.

login.title: Login
login.undertitle_desktop: A Homebridge user interface to control
login.forgotpw_info: If you forgot your password, you can reset the master credentials by setting 'reset' to true in your config.

change.undertitle: Please change your credentials to continue
change.same_username: Username and New Username must not be the same!
change.same_pw: Password and New Password must not be the same!
